philosophy.title: The Design Philosophy
philosophy.p1: In the quiet of the morning, there is only the Canvasâ€”a pristine, untouched void. Then came the Brush, guided by your breath, bringing the first drop of color to the surface.
philosophy.p2: Rupa is your creative sanctuary. Here, pixels are the building blocks of your story. Every mark you make is a deliberate act of creation that requires patience, focus, and a peaceful heart.
philosophy.p3: "We do not just paint pixels; we weave stories into the flow of time."

cursor.title: The Editor Cursor
cursor.desc: Your voice in the sanctuary. Move it with the Arrow Keys to guide your patterns with the precision of a master artisan.

colors.title: The Color Palette
colors.desc: Rich colors extracted from forest flora. Apply them with Space and switch colors using the numbers on your keyboard.

layers.title: The Layer System
layers.desc: Layers of depth. Like stacking fine paper, each layer adds a new dimension to your project.

continuous.title: Continuous Painting
continuous.desc: Hold Ctrl while moving to stream color across the canvas.

magic_select.title: Color Selection
magic_select.desc: Press W to select all connected pixels of the same tone. A powerful way to rearrange your project.

timeline.title: The Animation Flow
timeline.desc: Create sequences of frames to breathe life into your work. Press P to feel the pulse of your animation.

audio.title: Reactive Audio
audio.desc: Listen. The application responds to your focus with piano melodies and nature soundscapes.

footer.quote: May your brush be steady and your sanctuary ever-peaceful.
